name: getUserProperty
description:
Returns the value of a user's property. If no property key is provided [Get user property keys](#api-rest-api-3-user-properties-get) is called.

Note: This operation does not access the [user properties](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/8YxjL) created and maintained in Jira.

**[Permissions](#permissions) required:**

 *  *Administer Jira* [global permission](https://confluence.atlassian.com/x/x4dKLg), to get a property from any user.
 *  Access to Jira, to get a property from the calling user's record.

accountId.description: The account ID of the user, which uniquely identifies the user across all Atlassian products. For example, *5b10ac8d82e05b22cc7d4ef5*.

userKey.description: This parameter is no longer available and will be removed from the documentation soon. See the [deprecation notice](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/jira/platform/deprecation-notice-user-privacy-api-migration-guide/) for details.

username.description: This parameter is no longer available and will be removed from the documentation soon. See the [deprecation notice](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/jira/platform/deprecation-notice-user-privacy-api-migration-guide/) for details.

propertyKey.description: The key of the user's property.

$block: An entity property, for more information see [Entity properties](https://developer.atlassian.com/cloud/jira/platform/jira-entity-properties/).

$ul: **key**: The key of the property. Required on create and update.
**value**: The value of the property. Required on create and update.
